headings.usage: All section headers, card titles, hero text. Uppercase preferred for top-level headers.

mono.usage: Prices, dates, phone numbers, license IDs

rules: Use #FFCC00 for primary CTAs and highlights.
Use #0A0A0A for footers, heavy headers, and strong text.
Avoid gradients. Use solid, flat colors.

layout.container_style: Sharp edges, 2px solid black borders, brutalist shadows (4px 4px 0px 0px #000000).
layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers to balance the heavy borders.
layout.border_radius: rounded-sm (2px) or rounded-none (0px). NO large rounded corners.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FFCC00] text-black border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#000000] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_#000000] transition-all font-bold uppercase tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#000000] hover:bg-zinc-50 transition-all font-bold uppercase

inputs.style: border-2 border-black rounded-none focus:ring-0 focus:border-[#FFCC00] bg-zinc-50 h-12

assets.image_style: High contrast, urban, black and white or desaturated with yellow accents (if possible). No soft/dreamy filters.

hero.alt: Yellow taxi at night in Barcelona street

licencias.note: Use the car key image if found, otherwise generic key/doc

category_detail.layout: Grid of cards (1 col mobile, 3 col desktop)

universal_guidelines: Always use data-testid for interactive elements.
Responsive design: Mobile first. Stack grids on mobile.
Accessibility: Ensure text on yellow background is black.
Do NOT use gradients. Solid colors only.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a directory. Focus on the DATA display (cards) and the NAVIGATION. The 'Bento Grid' on the home page is the most important visual element. It should act as a dashboard for the driver. Use the provided image URLs for the category cards. For the Licencias image, if the key image is not available in the JSON, use a generic placeholder or the writing image again.
